AB.P1: Want to know will it rain in the next month/next year for holding some outdoor activities?
AB.P2: No problem! We predict the weather in the future!
AB.P3: We analysis the past weather data (from 1900) from Hong Kong Observatory and calculate a prediction of rain, temperature and humidity.
AB.P4: The prediction can help you to decide the activity date and avoid the raining. Don’t hesitate to try it out right now!

CW.FORECASR_EXPLAIN: The data of 9-day weather forecast comes from Hong Kong Observatory
